summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5118 for the improvement of East 45th Street, from Sand Point Way to 52nd Avenue Northeast on the south; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 58918, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
